description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
(CELLSNET-45437)- Support errors and Boolean value  in Russian locale in Excel to PDF rendering 
(CELLSNET-45456)- Reading cells' data, formula and style from numbers file. 
(CELLSNET-45483)- Support to change the row index start value to 0 (instead of 1) in Aspose.Cells.GridDesktop 
(CELLSNET-45434)- Gridweb ViewPanel is not always Visible 
(CELLSNET-45224)- Render PivotTable in GridDesktop 
Enhancements
(CELLSNET-45490)- Throw error or exception when wrong name is assigned to ListObject.DisplayName property 
(CELLSNET-45470)- Link Source DataSource vs. OriginalDataSource vs. Excel=>Data => Edit links 
(CELLSNET-45439)- GridDesktop.GetVersion() method needed to check the version number of GridDesktop on runtime 
Performance
(CELLSNET-45457)- Application gets stuck while trying to get picture's property 
Bugs
(CELLSNET-45388)- Arrow shape is not rendered fine in Sheet to Image (.jpg) renderings 
(CELLSNET-45426)- Chart data is unable to refresh data from Pivot Table 
(CELLSNET-45447)- Excel file corrupted when adding PivotTable after importing source data
(CELLSNET-45396)- Formatting error when Excel file is converted to HTML 
(CELLSNET-45402)- Cell.DisplayStringValue does not match with the original values 
(CELLSNET-45479)- Aspose.Cells 17.05 Incorrect Digital signing with DSA certificate 
(CELLSNET-45420)- DefaultFont setting not working 
(CELLSNET-45364)- Some shapes/objects are cut in the output PDF 
(CELLSNET-45491)- Some black blur thing attached to the data labels appeared in the output image of the chart 
(CELLSNET-45476)- The date format of the X-axis labels are changed and overridden on Legend entries 
(CELLSNET-45471)- III.LowerQualityAboveSML on 2nd page of Pdf is broken 
(CELLSNET-45454)- Bubble colors are changed a bit for different charts even using the same lines of code 
(CELLSNET-45452)- Sparklines are not rendered correctly in output PDF 
(CELLSNET-45493)- Resizing the ListObject do not get custom formatting carried across 
(CELLSNET-45482)- Some shapes are lost in XLS file when extracting and re-inserting images 
(CELLSNET-45466)- Some additional borders are automatically getting added
(CELLSNET-45464)- Axis type of the chart are changed after Workbook.Combine() 
(CELLSNET-45463)- Row heights and chart sizes become smaller when using Workbook.Combine() method 
(CELLSNET-45462)- Wrong paper size value is returned when worksheet doesn't have pageSetup settings 
(CELLSNET-45453)- Formatting of the worksheet changed after Workbook.Combine() 
(CELLSNET-45428)- Cells.DeleteBlankRows/DeleteBlankColumns removes the charts in the worksheet 
(CELLSNET-45488)- The GridWeb does not display all rows and encounters an error 
(CELLSNET-45438)- Rotating text of cell to 90 degree spoils the text alignment of the cell 
(CELLSNET-45425)- Gridweb adds space to excel dropdown entry 
(CELLSNET-42363)- Issue with pivot fields' captions in PivotTable  (GridWeb) 
Exceptions
(CELLSNET-45486)- NullReferenceException occurred when saving Excel workbook (having merged cells) to HTML file format 
(CELLSNET-45478)- Exception on opening a corrupted MHTML file via Aspose.Cells APIs 
(CELLSNET-45467)- 'System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException' occurred when loading an MHTML file 
(CELLSNET-45485)- Exception occurred when calculating a valid formula 
(CELLSNET-45433)- Exception occurs on opening fd1507a97b7f40fb85f9725535ecd215.xlsb 
(CELLSNET-45432)- Exception occurs on opening 0c29bc12429844fe983c2a152fa9b744.xlsb 
(CELLSNET-45431)- Exception occurs on opening 000bc1ec5fda4528a18f267f4dfe4a98.xlsb 
(CELLSNET-45430)- Exception occurs on opening failed_to_saved_in_xlsb_type.xlsx
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
